ComicInfo.Penciller: Guy Davis,Ryan Sook,Isaac Buckminster Owens,Guy Davis,Ryan Sook,Isaac Buckminster Owens
ComicInfo.Summary: On the mechanized battlefield of the not-too-distant future, a lone pilot seeks revenge on the enemy who shot her down. "Wunderkind" is the first published story by exciting new talent Isaac Buckminster Owens. Also in this issue: part two of the adventures of the enigmatic Nevermen and the conclusion to the mystic tale of Ragnoc.
